mapper.select: SELECT titulo, fecha, sum(precio) as precioPersona, sum(precio) * asistentes as precioTotal FROM evento, actividad, ( SELECT count(1) as asistentes FROM usu_even WHERE id_evento = #{idEvento} ) aux WHERE id_actividad IN ( SELECT id_actividad FROM even_act WHERE id_evento = #{idEvento} ) AND id_evento = #{idEvento}
SELECT id_usuario as id, nombre, picture FROM usuario WHERE id_usuario IN ( SELECT id_usuario FROM usu_even WHERE id_evento = #{idEvento} )

SELECT a.nombre, e.nombre AS nombreEmpresa, e.lat, e.lon, a.precio FROM actividad a, empresa e WHERE id_actividad IN ( SELECT id_actividad FROM even_act WHERE id_evento = #{idEvento} ) AND a.id_empresa = e.id_empresa
